name: Combat Drones
rulesText:
Flash
When Combat Drones enters the battlefield, attach it to target unit you control.
Equipped unit gets +2/+1
Equip 3

name: Hoverbike

name: Swallowers of Civilization
rulesText: Swallowers of Civilization costs 1 more to issue for each land you control.

name: Baljurashi Watchmen
rulesText: As long as Baljurashi Watchmen is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and first strike.

name: Bergstadt Justice
rulesText:
You may dematerialise Bergstadt Justice as you draw it if you control a Plains.
As long as Bergstadt Justice is dematerialised, when a unit attacks you or an organization you control, issue Bergstadt Justice without paying its psi cost.
Destroy target attacking unit.

name: Bergstadt Police Department
rulesText:
+1: Displace up to one target nontoken unit.
-2: You gain a tag with “Units can’t attack you or an organization you control unless their controller pays 1 for each of those units.”
-6: You gain a tag with “If a nontoken unit would enter the battlefield under an opponent’s control and it wasn’t issued, dematerialise it instead.”

name: Biomech Corps
rulesText: When Biomech Corps enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

name: Cache Mapper
rulesText: When Cache Mapper enters the battlefield, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to this unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 1.)

name: Comms Disruptor
rulesText:
Equipped unit can’t be intercepted by units with converted psi cost 3 or greater.
Whenever equipped unit deals combat damage to a player, that player chooses main phase or combat phase. That player skips each instance of the chosen phase during his or her next turn.
Equip 2

name: Community Officer
rulesText: When Community Officer enters the battlefield, you may displace another target unit. (Dematerialise that unit. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Covering Fire
rulesText:
Units you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
If you control five or more units, units you control also gain lifelink until end of turn.

name: Crash Landing
rulesText:

Create two 1/1 white Military unit tokens.

name: Cryonics Facility

4WW: Put a +1/+1 counter on each unit you control.

Modify unit

Flying
Draco Guardian gets +1/+1 as long as you control five or more units.

name: Dropship

Flying

name: Eviction Notice
rulesText: Dematerialise target tapped unit. You gain 2 life.

name: Fleet Overseer
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.

name: Head Detective

Defender, flying

Flying, trample

rulesText: Choose target unit. If it’s equipped, it gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Otherwise, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to that unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 1.)

rulesText: Target player returns three units he or she controls to their owners’ hands.

Flying

You may dematerialise Nomads’ Assurance as you draw it if you control a Mountain.
As long as Nomads’ Assurance is dematerialised, when an opponent is dealt damage, issue Nomads’ Assurance without paying its psi cost.
Nomads’ Assurance deals damage to each opponent equal to the amount of damage dealt to him or her this turn.

name: Ohmwrecker
rulesText: As long as Ohmwrecker isn’t equipped, it can’t attack or intercept unless you pay 2.

name: Renounce
rulesText: Each player chooses at random five permanents he or she controls. Destroy the rest.

name: Reverse Polarity
rulesText:
Target device unit gets +X/-X until end of turn.
Target device unit gets -X/+X until end of turn.

name: Rip Space-Time
rulesText: Rip Space-Time deals 5 damage to target unit or player and 2 damage to you.

name: Rocket Salvo
rulesText:
Rocket Salvo deals 2 damage to target unit.
Rocket Salvo deals 4 damage to that unit instead if you control three or more devices.

name: Scrapyard Salvager
rulesText: 3R, Sacrifice a device: Create two 1/1 colorless Mech device unit tokens.

name: Selfdestruct Sequence
rulesText:
As an additional cost to issue Selfdestruct Sequence, sacrifice a device.
Destroy target device.

name: Slagthrower
rulesText: R, T, Sacrifice a device: Slagthrower deals 2 damage to target unit or player and 1 damage to you. Activate this ability only any time you could issue a strategy.

name: Slipstream Hunters
rulesText:
First strike
Other device units you control have first strike.
Tap four untapped devices you control: Slipstream Hunters deals 1 damage to target player.

name: Speed Demon
rulesText:
Haste
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Speed Demon unless you sacrifice a device.

name: Supervolcanic Fallout
rulesText:
Supervolcanic Fallout deals 3 damage to each player.
Displace up to three target units your opponents control. (Dematerialise those units. Return them to the battlefield under their owners’ control at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Supply Runner
rulesText: Whenever Supply Runner deals combat damage to a player, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to this unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 1.)

name: Vulcan Devastators
rulesText: Sacrifice a device: Vulcan Devastators gains haste until end of turn.

name: Walking Furnace
rulesText: Whenever another device is put into your trashpile from the battlefield, you may pay 2. If you do, Walking Furnace deals 2 damage to target unit or player.

name: Warapur Company Flagship
rulesText:
Flying
Warapur Company Flagship and other Mercenary units you control have plunder.  (Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Sacrifice four devices: Warapur Company Flagship deals 4 damage to target unit or player.

name: Warapur Company Grunt
rulesText:
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Whenever Warapur Company Grunt attacks, you may sacrifice a device. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token.

name: Warapur Company Heavy
rulesText:
Trample, plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Whenever Warapur Company Heavy attacks, sacrifice any number of devices. Warapur Company Heavy gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each device sacrificed this way.

name: Week of Hate
rulesText: After the first postcombat main phase on each of your turns, there’s an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all units that attacked this turn.

name: Wild Game Huntmaster
rulesText:
Haste
When Wild Game Huntmaster enters the battlefield, for each Equipment on the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech Hound device unit token with haste and you may attach that Equipment to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn’t change.)

name: Baljurashi Wanderer
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gains trample until end of turn.

name: Bioarchitect
rulesText: Sacrifice Bioarchitect: Activate an activated ability of target permanent you control up to two times without paying its costs.

name: Biocourier
rulesText: Whenever another unit falls, put a +1/+1 counter on Biocourier and Biocourier gains cloaking until end of turn. (It can’t be the target of orders or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Brood Ambush
rulesText: Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”

name: Clutch Spawning
rulesText: If you control fewer than five units, create a number of 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens equal to the difference. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”

name: Deep into the Subconscious
rulesText: Target unit you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each unit you control. Return it to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Ecosystem Collapse
rulesText: Destroy up to one target device, up to one target development, and up to one target land.

name: Escaped Test Subject
rulesText: 5G: All units able to intercept Escaped Test Subject this turn do so.

name: Experiment T.I.T.A.N.
rulesText:
Defender, trample
2, Tap an untapped unit you control: Experiment T.I.T.A.N. gets +2/+2 and loses defender until end of turn.

name: Extraterrestrial Exploration
rulesText: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped. Shuffle your library, then put the other on top of it.

name: Failed Kushak Subject
rulesText:
Trample, cloaking
Failed Kushak Subject enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Failed Kushak Subject deals combat damage to a player, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

name: Frontier Anatomist
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, that unit gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Genome Toggle
rulesText: Sacrifice any number of units. Create a 6/6 green Mutant unit token for each unit sacrificed this way.

name: Gestation Cycle
rulesText:
Modify unit
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on modified unit.
When modified unit falls, create an X/X green Mutant unit token, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Growth Genetics
rulesText:
Modify unit
Modified unit gets +5/+5 and has mutate. (When it falls, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a unit card that costs less. That player puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.)

name: Incubation Hulk
rulesText: When Incubation Hulk falls, create three 2/2 green Xeno Propagator unit tokens with “When this unit falls, create three 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have ‘Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.’”

name: The Kishar
rulesText:
Flying, trample
Prevent all combat damage that units without flying or reach would deal to The Kishar.
Whenever The Kishar enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”

name: Kushak Artifact
rulesText: Whenever a nontoken unit you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay its psi cost and sacrifice it. If you do, create two tokens that are copies of that unit.

name: Kushak Brood Warden
rulesText: 2, T, Sacrifice a unit: Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”

name: Kushak Interference
rulesText:
You may dematerialise Kushak Interference as you draw it if you control a Forest.
As long as Kushak Interference is dematerialised, when a unit you control becomes the target of an order or ability, issue Kushak Interference without paying its psi cost.
Target unit gets +3/+3 and gains cloaking until end of turn.

name: Kushak R&D, Basirah Branch
rulesText:
+1: Create a 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit token. It has “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”
-4: Destroy target device or development. Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion unit tokens. They have “Sacrifice this unit: Add C to your psi cache.”
-5: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Xeno unit you control for each Xeno unit you control.

name: Kushak Research Council
rulesText:
Each other unit you control that’s a Mutant or a Xeno gets +1/+1 and has mutate.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Lifestrider
rulesText:
T: Add one psi of any color to your psi cache.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Lone Wanderer
rulesText:
When Lone Wanderer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token.
Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, units you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Mutagenic Serum
rulesText:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target unit.
Whenever a unit enters the battlefield under your control during an opponent’s turn, return Mutagenic Serum from your trashpile to your hand.

name: Myth of Baljurashi
rulesText:
When Myth of Baljurashi enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Prey Upon
rulesText: Target unit you control fights target unit you don’t control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Radium Tracker
rulesText: Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Reverse Gravity
rulesText: Until end of turn, each unit you control without flying gets +2/+2 and gains trample and each unit you don’t control with flying can’t intercept units without flying.

name: SAM Team
rulesText:
Flash (You can issue this order any time you could issue an instant.)
Reach

name: Screeching Terror
rulesText: When Screeching Terror enters the battlefield, units you control can’t be intercepted by units with power 2 or less this turn.

name: Sewer Monster
rulesText:
While issuing Sewer Monster, each unit you sacrifice after you’re done activating psi abilities reduces its cost by 2.
Mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a unit card that costs less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Sewer Unit
rulesText: When Sewer Unit enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech device unit token. If a unit fell this turn, create two of those tokens instead.

name: Supply Scavengers
rulesText:
Trample
1, Tap an untapped unit you control: Supply Scavengers gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Support Team
rulesText:
Flash (You can issue this order any time you could issue an instant.)
When Support Team enters the battlefield, you may pay 1. If you do, target unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Suppressor of Worlds
rulesText:
Trample, cloaking
Suppressor of Worlds enters the battlefield with three suppression counters on it.
Remove a suppression counter from Suppressor: Counter target activated ability or triggered ability. (Psi abilities can’t be targeted.)

name: Surge of Fervor
rulesText:
Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target units.
Target unit gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Untap target unit. That unit gains reach until end of turn.

name: Terraforming Works
rulesText: 2GG, Sacrifice a land: Create a 6/6 green Mutant unit token.

name: Ultramagnetic Interference
rulesText:
Destroy up to one target device or development.
Up to one target unit you control gains protection from devices and from developments until end of turn.

name: Unstable Growth
rulesText: Up to two target units each get +2/+2 and gain cloaking and trample until end of turn.

name: Urban Ravager
rulesText:
Flash (You can issue this order any time you could issue an instant.)
As Urban Ravager enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of units. Urban Ravager enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Wanderer Caravans
rulesText: Whenever a unit you control becomes the target of an order, that unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: High Judge Zephynius
rulesText: Units your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped and have “This unit doesn’t untap during your untap step” and “At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2. If you do, untap this unit.”

name: Wings of the Law
rulesText:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever a card is dematerialised, put a +1/+1 counter on Wings of the Law.

name: Twilight Strider
rulesText:
Furtive (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be intercepted this turn.)
At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost life this turn, untap Twilight Strider and each opponent loses 1 life.

name: Whisper, the Cleaner
rulesText:
Furtive (Whenever this unit attacks with exactly one other unit, it can’t be intercepted this turn.)
Whenever Whisper, the Cleaner deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• That player discards a card.
• You draw a card.

name: Thousand Spares
rulesText: Sacrifice another device: Thousand Spares gains indestructible and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Thousand Spares’s power.

name: Warapur Company Guard
rulesText:
Plunder (Whenever this unit deals combat damage to a player, create a colorless Credit device token.)
Sacrifice a device: Warapur Company Guard deals 1 damage to each opponent.

name: Canyon Skitterer
rulesText: Whenever you issue an instant or strategy, if that instant or strategy targets only Canyon Skitterer, you may copy it up to two times. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: The Honored Wurmcaller
rulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 5/5 red and green legendary unit token named Shaitan. It has haste and trample.

name: Ingolf, the Catalyst
rulesText: Whenever another unit enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each unit you control.

name: Support Misdirector
rulesText: When Support Misdirector enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Hologram device unit token for each other unit you control.

name: Publicity Officer
rulesText: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained or lost life this turn, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (Gaining life doesn’t count against losing life.)

name: Representative Vuissance
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
T, Pay 1 life: Draw a card.

name: Gravitic Collector Alpha
rulesText:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that units without flying or reach would deal to Gravitic Collector Alpha.
At the beginning of each upkeep, another target unit you control gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

name: Scrap Ferries
rulesText:
Flying
2, Tap an untapped device you control: Target device unit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Sewer Dredgers
rulesText: 3, Dematerialise a unit card from your trashpile: Put a +1/+1 counter on Sewer Dredgers. You gain 1 life and draw a card.

name: Titan of Shisuku Sewers
rulesText:
Lethality (Any amount of damage this deals to a unit is enough to destroy it.)
Mutate, mutate (When this unit falls, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal two unit cards that cost less. Put those cards onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Agent Magpie
rulesText:
Double strike
Whenever Agent Magpie deals combat damage to a player, arm it. (Create a colorless Equipment device token attached to this unit. It has “Equipped unit gets +1/+1” and equip 1.)

name: Baljurashi Irregulars
rulesText: Equipped units you control get +1/+1.

name: CEO Umida Koto
rulesText:
Untap all lands you control during each other player’s untap step.
You can issue orders as though they had flash. (You can issue them any time you could issue an instant.)

name: Troposphere Drifter
rulesText:
Flash (You can issue this order any time you could issue an instant.)
Flying
Whenever you issue an order, Troposphere Drifter gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that order’s converted psi cost.

name: Biodome
rulesText: T, Sacrifice Biodome: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your libary.
